projects.title: Disliket
projects.description: Exprésate, serás escuchadoConoce las ventajas¿Cuantas veces te has quedado con un disgusto? ahora es el momento de expresarlo, todo aquello que no apruebes dejalo saber que el mundo se tiene que enterar.Es nuestra labor informar lo que no esta bien para que se mejore. Tu solo exprésalo nosotros nos encargamos del resto, lo harémos llegar a quien sea correspondiente para darle solución.Compartelo con tus amigos para que poco a poco entre todos logremos cambiar lo que no esta bien.

projects.title: Interaculta
projects.description: ¡SENSORES 3D APLICADOS AL APRENDIZAJE!Interaculta es la plataforma en la que aprendes haciendo las cosas, guiado por los máximos exponentes y compartiendo los momentos mas emocionantes con el mundo. De esta manera se incrementa de forma importante la afluencia a los centros culturales, así como el aprendizaje de los asistentes gracias a la última tecnología mediante interfaces naturales de usuario

projects.title: Fit Challenge
projects.description: Fit challenge is a fun gamified application that helps improve your habits, competing with your friends.

projects.title: MyCurriculum
projects.description: Curriculum Vitae & Resume optimized, shareable and fancy generator.Optimized & fancy Curriculum Vitae Instantly!A boring and plain CV doesn't reflect our creativity, the rules are changing, we are in a real competitive world where you must be pratical and effective. We provide you an amazing tool to stand out from the rest and tell the world that you're the one.Download and share on internet or in a card!Your curriculum will be avaiable to view and share with your friends in your personal profile page with more than one view if you decide who can see what. We geberate you presentation cards with your curriculum as a qr code.Tons of templates!Formalt and cool templates are avaible, if your Cv needs to be serious you can switch to it, or if it must be more creattive you can switch on anytime.Statics in realtime, who is seeing what!You can control, in what part of your curriculum the people is more impressed, or if your curriculum is not attractive you can see when the people es leaving.Adaptable to any device!Now you can show your CV on any device on an easy reading format. you can go to everywhere with your curriculum on your pocket, and shareable in multiple ways.

projects.title: +Marks
projects.description: earch Smarter !You will never lose a cookmark again. PlusMarks uses the most advances search engine ever to find inside of the bookmark content.Just add a page to bookmark and thats all, you don´t need to tag the bookmark or write extra information, no additional software must be installed.It´s time of smart bookmarking, don´t loose again time bookmarking and searching it.PlusMarks FeaturesSearch in content !The other tools search only on the subject and not in content.No extra software !The other tools requiere extra software to sync bookmarks.Zero configuration !Te other tools requiere some rules and complex installation.

past_companies.title: Technical Program Manager
past_companies.description: Technical Program Manager Apps Development - Google for Education - Emerging Markets (01/14 - 06/15)Main Responsibilities: Design and develop fully functional and customizable software integration solutions that allow schools to use Google products and technologies to improve teaching, learning, and administration, helping students to solve their educational needs. Evaluate networking and software projects proposed by universities and partners, providing advice on the best way to design cloud-ready solutions for all community members.Main Achievements: Products developedFollowed the entire product life cycle (proposal, technical design, development, reviewing and publishing) of “Account provisioning for Google Apps” API and it is published in Google’s official github.Developed Groups Generator for Schools Add-On, a tool that creates users, groups, calendars, shared folders, sites, circles and org unit in bulk using a CSV file. Developed using Apps Script.Developed multiple integration snippets using Google Apps Script to solve common Education use cases.Content generation: Published the Google plugins in Moodle official site and created the content of the section “Systems Integration” in Google for Work Connect platform.Integration: More than 100k users provisioned in schools of Africa and America.Public speaking: More than 10 public talks/webinars on behalf of Google.

current_companies.description: Technical Solutions SpecialistMain Responsibilities: The design and development of tools to improve education in all public elementary schools. middle schools, and high schools in Mexico, especially focused on CS curriculum, and have full coordination with the federal government.Main Achievements:The design and development of “Drive Sync” tool, this tool synchronizes the content of over 2 million tablets that were given to children of the 5th and 6th grades at the national level.The design of an Android development curricula and training for all high school professors at the national level (around 150k CS students).Design of a programming curricula for all elementary schools at the national level using Scratch (starting pilot with over a million children).Research paper “Quantifying the Economic Value of Tablets for K–12 Education”.
